data.persona: I love god and his word. I have 10 copies of the bible. I am poor in money but rich in salvation.
data.description:
You are in the The Ghost Trail.
The Ghost Trail is dark, with no torches or writing.  The stars shine over head, the glow of the moon seems to beam in lulls. The trail seems to go on east or west as far as the eye can see.
The ghost is here.

You are carrying nothing.

data.short_motivation: I have found the ghost of a family member
data.mid_motivation: I hope to tell the ghost of the happenings since his passing
data.long_motivation: I hope to find a witch doctor that can resurrect my family member
